abstract: Citigroup has hired Elinor Hoover from Morgan Stanley as a vice chairwoman for capital markets and origination in the Americas, the firm announced in an internal memorandum on Wednesday.
snippet: Citigroup has hired Elinor Hoover from Morgan Stanley as a vice chairwoman for capital markets and origination in the Americas, the firm announced in an internal memorandum on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup has hired Elinor Hoover from Morgan Stanley as a vice chairwoman for capital markets and origination in the Americas, the firm announced in an internal memorandum on Wednesday. A 20-year veteran of Morgan Stanley, Ms. Hoover will start at Citi on Sept. 6. She will report to John Chirico and Richard Zogheb, the co-heads of Citi’s capital markets business.

headline.main: Citi Hires Senior Capital Markets Banker

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
